Geology.1: Be able to understand basic physical geology, historical geology, stratigraphy, and petrology and their roles in building earth materials.
Geology.2: Be able to understand structural geology and geomorphology and their roles in landscape evolution.
Geology.3: Be able to make accurate field observations and geomorphology and their roles in landscape evolution.
Geology.4: Be able to present geological date and results as a coherent written and oral reports.
